decks.notes: The deck aims to generate massive amounts of mana quickly, using artifact ramp like Mana Vault and Moxen, as well as Mishra's Workshop and Tolarian Academy. It then utilizes cards like Paradoxical Outcome and Phyrexian Metamorph to draw through the deck and generate more mana. The end goal is to assemble the Time Vault and Voltaic Key combo to take extra turns and win the game. Karn, the Great Creator can also be used to fetch key artifacts from the sideboard, providing additional flexibility and ways to disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to generate mana quickly and efficiently, allowing for explosive plays and setting up powerful combo interactions. By utilizing Paradoxical Outcome to bounce multiple artifacts back to hand and draw cards, the deck can generate immense value and set up game-winning plays. With cards like Mishra's Workshop and Ancient Tomb to provide additional mana acceleration, along with key pieces like Time Vault and Tinker to assemble game-winning combos, this deck aims to overwhelm and outpace opponents through the power of artifact synergy and combo interactions.

This Dredge combo deck utilizes cards like Stinkweed Imp, Narcomoeba, and Creeping Chill to fill up the graveyard quickly and bring back powerful creatures like Prized Amalgam and Ichorid. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Force of Negation to protect the combo. The use of Bazaar of Baghdad allows for efficient graveyard filling, while cards like Noxious Revival and Grief provide additional graveyard manipulation and disruption. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with an army of creatures from the graveyard.

This deck aims to quickly assemble the combo of Underworld Breach along with cards like Brain Freeze, Hullbreacher, and Wheel of Fortune to generate a massive storm count and mill the opponent out in a single turn. It utilizes powerful mana acceleration in the form of Black Lotus, Moxen, and Tolarian Academy to quickly cast its key spells and disrupt the opponent with counters like Force of Will and Pyroblast. The deck also includes various tutors and card draw spells to help find the combo pieces and protect its game plan.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy while also utilizing hatebear creatures to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Cards like Archon of Emeria and Chancellor of the Annex slow down the opponent's spells, while Anointed Peacekeeper and White Plume Adventurer provide aggressive creatures. The deck also includes powerful artifacts like Black Lotus and Moxen for mana acceleration. Additionally, cards like March of Otherworldly Light and The One Ring offer additional value and versatility. The mana base is streamlined with Cavern of Souls and Wasteland to ensure consistent casting of spells.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo pieces, mainly Underworld Breach, to create a powerful engine that allows for explosive plays and generates immense value. It aims to quickly draw through the deck using cards like Ancestral Recall and Ponder, as well as efficiently tutor for key pieces with cards like Demonic Tutor and Vampiric Tutor. The synergy between cards like Hullbreacher and Wheel of Fortune disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also providing additional advantage for the player. The deck is designed to win the game in a fast and efficient manner through its combo potential and powerful interaction.
